meanings.definition: A person or thing that stains.
meanings.sent1: The stainers left marks on the carpet.
meanings.sent2: The painters used stainers to color the walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous stainers spilled juice on the white tablecloth.
meanings.sent4: The stainers of reputation tarnished his name in the community.
meanings.sent5: The stainers of time slowly darkened the once bright fabric.

meanings.sent1: The stainers gathered to discuss their next project.
meanings.sent2: She bought a set of stainers for her art class.
meanings.sent3: The stainers in the drawer clinked together as she opened it.
meanings.sent4: The stainers in the forest were a vibrant mix of colors.
meanings.sent5: The stainers on the shelf caught the sunlight and sparkled.
